alert.note: Alert for Lower Washington County (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:03AM MST until January 11 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Within the St. George area and elevations below 2,800ft, less than one inch of accumulation expected. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lower Washington County, particularly for elevations above 2,800ft. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility along the I-15 corridor.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov.
